properties.description: Daily from 10am -6pm The warm space is available anytime the centre is open from 10am - 6pm. They run lots of groups throughout the day including a lunch club for over 50's on a Thursday between 12.30 and 2pm. For morew information on the groups please call the centre on 01496 810767 or email Martyn Chandler [email protected]​.
properties.title: MacTaggart Leisure Centre

properties.address: 30 Mansefield Place, Port Ellen, United Kingdom, PA42 7BJ
properties.description: Join the ladies of St John's Church catering team for soup, cake and a tea or coffee. Donations welcomed but no necessary.

hours._text: The Warm Hub is available Tuesday's from 12pm-2pm .

properties.title: Mactaggart Youth and Community Outreach Services
